TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Trace extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一组方法和属性，帮助您跟踪代码的执行。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that help you trace the execution of your code.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用的属性和方法中的类来检测发行版本。You can use the properties and methods in the class to instrument release builds. 检测可用于监视在现实环境中运行的应用程序的运行状况。Instrumentation allows you to monitor the health of your application running in real-life settings. 跟踪可帮助你隔离问题并进行修改而不会影响正在运行的系统。Tracing helps you isolate problems and fix them without disturbing a running system. 此类提供方法以显示对话框中，并发出始终将的断言。This class provides methods to display an dialog box, and to emit an assertion that will always . 此类提供了以下各种变体的写入方法： ， ， ，和。This class provides write methods in the following variations: , , , and . 和类提供动态控制跟踪输出方法。The and classes provide means to dynamically control the tracing output. 无需重新编译你的应用程序，可以修改这些开关的值。You can modify the values of these switches without recompiling your application. 有关使用配置文件设置开关的信息，请参阅类和[如何： 创建、 初始化和配置跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md)主题。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see the class and the [How to: Create, Initialize and Configure Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md) topic. 可以通过添加自定义跟踪输出的目标到实例或删除实例从集合。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding instances to or removing instances from the collection. 集合共享的同时和类; 添加到其中一个类跟踪侦听器将侦听器添加到同时。The collection is shared by both the and the classes; adding a trace listener to either class adds the listener to both. 默认情况下，跟踪输出，将发出使用类。By default, trace output is emitted using the class. > [!NOTE] > 添加到跟踪侦听器集合可能导致跟踪，时引发异常，如果跟踪侦听器使用的资源不可用。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 条件和引发的异常取决于跟踪侦听器，并不能在本主题中枚举。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 可能会很有用，将调用中的方法`try` / `catch`块以检测和处理跟踪侦听器中的任何异常。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. > [!NOTE] > 如果将跟踪侦听器添加到部分受信任的代码，则您将收到 异常，因为添加跟踪侦听器需要 权限。If you add trace listeners to partially trusted code, you will get a exception, because adding trace listeners requires permission. 若要跟踪正在 Visual Studio 的沙盒中运行的部分受信任的代码，请不要添加跟踪侦听器。To trace partially trusted code that is running in a sandbox in Visual Studio, do not add trace listeners. 相反，查看并中的消息**输出**窗口。Instead, view the and messages in the **Output** window. 类提供的属性以获取或设置的级别，则，以及是否每次写入后。The class provides properties to get or set the level of , the , and whether to after each write. 若要设置并为，可以编辑你的应用程序的名称对应的配置文件。To set the and for , you can edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` 特性应用于的方法。The attribute is applied to the methods of . 支持的编译器忽略对这些方法的调用，除非"TRACE"定义为条件编译符号。Compilers that support ignore calls to these methods unless "TRACE" is defined as a conditional compilation symbol. 请参阅编译器的文档以确定是否支持以及用于定义条件编译符号的语法。Refer to a compiler's documentation to determine whether is supported and the syntax for defining a conditional compilation symbol. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio 项目中，默认情况下，为调试版本定义“DEBUG”条件编译符号，并为调试版本和发行版本定义“TRACE”符号。In Visual Studio projects, by default, the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol is defined for debug builds, and the "TRACE" symbol is defined for both debug and release builds. 有关如何禁用此行为的信息，请参阅 Visual Studio 文档。For information about how to disable this behavior, see the Visual Studio documentation. 若要在 C# 中定义“TRACE”条件编译符号，请在使用命令行编译代码时将 `/d:TRACE` 选项添加到编译器命令行，或将 `#define TRACE` 添加到文件顶部。To define the "TRACE" conditional compilation symbol in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` option to the compiler command line when you compile your code using a command line, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:TRACE=True`到编译器命令行选项，或添加`#Const TRACE=True`的文件。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` option to the compiler command line or add `#Const TRACE=True` to the file. 不支持 c + + 编译器。 is not supported by the C++ compiler. 若要提供等效功能，必须将调用的方法中`#if defined(TRACE) ... #endif`块，并添加`/DTRACE`到编译器命令行选项，或添加`#define TRACE`的文件。To provide equivalent functionality, you must enclose calls to the methods of in an `#if defined(TRACE) ... #endif` block, and add the `/DTRACE` option to the compiler command line or add `#define TRACE` to the file. ## Examples 下面的示例使用指示开始和结束对程序的执行。The following example uses to indicate the beginning and the end of a program's execution. 此示例还使用和方法来区分将跟踪输出。The example also uses the and methods to distinguish the tracing output. 有关使用的更完整示例，请参阅[如何： 向应用程序代码添加 Trace 语句](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-add-trace-statements-to-application-code.md)。For a more complete example of the use of , see [How to: Add Trace Statements to Application Code](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-add-trace-statements-to-application-code.md). [!code-cpp[Classic Trace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Trace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Trace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法如果你想要执行断言版本中的生成。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 方法仅适用于调试版本。The method works only in debug builds. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管代码中的断言](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed Code](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code). 通常情况下，方法用于标识程序开发过程的逻辑错误。Typically, the method is used to identify logic errors during program development. 评估的条件。 evaluates the condition. 如果结果为`false`，它将发送到失败消息集合。If the result is `false`, it sends a failure message to the collection. 可以通过添加自定义此行为，或从中移除集合。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or removing one from, the collection. 当在用户界面模式下运行应用程序时，它显示一个消息框，显示调用堆栈与文件和行号。When the application runs in user-interface mode, it displays a message box that shows the call stack with file and line numbers. 消息框包含三个按钮：**中止**，**重试**，并**忽略**。The message box contains three buttons: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore**. 单击**中止**按钮将终止该应用程序。Clicking the **Abort** button terminates the application. 单击**重试**向你发送到调试器中的代码，如果你的应用程序在调试器中运行或产品/服务如果不是打开调试程序。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 单击**忽略**将继续执行下一个指令在代码中。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > 消息框显示取决于是否存在。The display of the message box depends on the presence of the . 如果不在集合，该消息框不会显示。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以通过移除[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，则[<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，或通过调用方法属性 (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`)。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 您可以更改的行为对应于你的应用程序的名称在配置文件中。You can change the behavior of the in the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，你可以启用和禁用断言消息框或设置属性。In this file, you can enable and disable the assert message box or set the property. 应按如下所示设置格式的配置文件：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ``` ## Examples 以下示例创建一个数组的索引。The following example creates an index for an array. 然后将执行一些操作，用于设置索引的值。Then some action is performed that sets the value of the index. 接下来，该代码调用以验证索引值是否有效。Next the code calls to verify the index value is valid. 如果不是有效的调用堆栈输出。If it is not valid, the outputs the call stack. [!code-cpp[Classic Trace.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Assert Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Trace.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Assert Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Trace.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Assert Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. 除非显式调用，刷新该流不会刷新其基础编码器或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or . 设置到`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但编码器状态不会进行刷新。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8，UTF7 其中某些字符仅后才能进行编码的编码器收到的相邻字符。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. 若要设置并为，还可以编辑你的应用程序的名称对应的配置文件。To set the and for , you can also edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法时输出将一个文件，如到。Use this method when the output is going to a file, such as to the . 除非显式调用，刷新该流不会刷新其基础编码器或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or . 设置到`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但编码器状态不会进行刷新。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8，UTF7 其中某些字符仅后才能进行编码的编码器收到的相邻字符。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为`myTextListener`。The following example creates a named `myTextListener`. `myTextListener` 使用称为`myOutputWriter`要写入到名为的文件`TestFile.txt`。`myTextListener` uses a called `myOutputWriter` to write to a file named `TestFile.txt`. 该示例创建文件、 流和文本编写器、 将一行文本写入到该文件，然后刷新并关闭输出。The example creates the file, stream and text writer, writes one line of text to the file, and then flushes and closes the output. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，输出将写入到的实例。By default, the output is written to an instance of . 此方法调用方法的跟踪侦听器。This method calls the method of the trace listener. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 提供了跟踪功能定制的 Web 页面。ASP.NET supplies tracing functionality tailored for Web pages. 若要将跟踪消息写入 ASP.NET 页面中，使用属性。To write trace messages in ASP.NET pages, use the property. 默认情况下，在代码中与 ASP.NET Web 页，该语句相关联`Trace.Write("...")`是对的调用方法的属性。By default, in code associated with an ASP.NET Web page, the statement `Trace.Write("...")` is a call to the method of the property. 若要使用类在 Web 页中，您必须包括命名空间，例如， `System.Diagnostics.Trace.Write("...")`。To use the class in Web pages, you must include the namespace, for example, `System.Diagnostics.Trace.Write("...")`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为`generalSwitch`。The following example creates a named `generalSwitch`. 此开关设置之外的代码示例。This switch is set outside the code sample. 如果此开关设置为`Error`或更高版本，该示例将输出的名字`value`参数。If the switch is set to the `Error` or higher, the example outputs the first name of the `value` parameter to the . 有关信息添加到侦听器集合，请参阅类。For information on adding a listener to the collection, see the class. 然后，如果设置为`Verbose`，该示例将输出第一条消息的同一行中的消息。Then, if the is set to `Verbose`, the example outputs a message on the same line as the first message. 第二条消息后跟行结束符。The second message is followed by a line terminator. block.para:
可以通过使用装备您的应用程序的性能损失降到最低语句而不是使用语句。
You can minimize the performance penalty of instrumenting your application by using statements instead of using statements.
以下两个代码示例发送相同的调试消息。
The following two code examples send the same debugging message.
但是，第一个示例是要快得多时跟踪处于关闭状态，因为如果mySwitch.TraceError的计算结果为不调用。
However, the first example is much faster when tracing is off, because if mySwitch.TraceError evaluates to you do not call .
第二个示例始终调用，即使mySwitch.TraceError是和不生成任何跟踪输出。
The second example always calls , even when mySwitch.TraceError is and no tracing output is produced.
这可能导致不必要地执行任意复杂的代码。
This can result in unnecessary execution of arbitrarily complex code.
**第一个示例**
**First example**
```csharp if(mySwitch.TraceError) Trace.Write("aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```
**第二个示例****Second example**
```csharp Trace.WriteIf(mySwitch.TraceError, "aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，输出将写入到的实例。By default, the output is written to an instance of . `category`参数可用于输出消息进行分组。The `category` parameter can be used to group output messages. 此方法调用方法的跟踪侦听器。This method calls the method of the trace listener. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为`generalSwitch`。The following example creates a named `generalSwitch`. 此开关设置之外的代码示例。This switch is set outside the code sample. 如果此开关设置为`Error`或更高版本，该示例将输出到第一条错误信息。If the switch is set to the `Error` or higher, the example outputs the first error message to the . 有关信息添加到侦听器集合，请参阅类。For information on adding a listener to the collection, see the class. 然后，如果设置为`Verbose`，该示例将输出第二条错误消息和`category`第一条消息的同一行上。Then, if the is set to `Verbose`, the example outputs the second error message and the `category` on the same line as the first message. 第二条消息后跟行结束符。The second message is followed by a line terminator. [!code-cpp[Classic Trace.WriteLineIf2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.WriteLineIf2 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Trace.WriteLineIf2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.WriteLineIf2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Trace.WriteLineIf2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.WriteLineIf2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

block.para:
可以通过使用装备您的应用程序的性能损失降到最低语句而不是使用语句。
You can minimize the performance penalty of instrumenting your application by using statements instead of using statements.
以下两个代码示例发送相同的调试消息。
The following two code examples send the same debugging message.
但是，第一个示例是要快得多时跟踪处于关闭状态，因为如果mySwitch.TraceError的计算结果为不调用。
However, the first example is much faster when tracing is off, because if mySwitch.TraceError evaluates to you do not call .
第二个示例始终调用，即使mySwitch.TraceError是和不生成任何跟踪输出。
The second example always calls , even when mySwitch.TraceError is and no tracing output is produced.
这可能导致不必要地执行任意复杂的代码。
This can result in unnecessary execution of arbitrarily complex code.
**第一个示例**
**First example**
```csharp if(mySwitch.TraceError) Trace.WriteLine("aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```
**第二个示例****Second example**
```csharp Trace.WriteLineIf(mySwitch.TraceError, "aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```
